mapper.select: select p1.projectsid,e1.empid,e1.username,w1.value,to_char(p1.addtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as addtime,a1.value state ,p1.approver from projects p1,employee e1,word w1,word a1 where p1.empid=e1.empid and p1.originatortype=w1.key and a1.key=p1.projectsstate and approver is null and p1.projectsstate=15
mapper.update: update projects set approver=#{approver} where projectsid=#{projectsid}
mapper.select: select r1.empid,r1.projectsid,to_char(r1.recordtable_begintime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordtable_begintime,to_char(r1.recordtable_endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordtable_endtime,r1.reason,p1.empid empids,p1.projectsstate from recordtable r1,projects p1,employee e1 where r1.empid=e1.empid and r1.projectsid=p1.projectsid and projectsstate=11

select r1.empid,r1.projectsid,to_char(r1.recordtable_begintime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordtable_begintime,to_char(r1.recordtable_endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recordtable_endtime,r1.reason,p1.empid empids,p1.projectsstate from recordtable r1,projects p1,employee e1 where r1.empid=e1.empid and r1.projectsid=p1.projectsid and projectsstate=88
